cards.name: Abzan Battle Priest
cards.text:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.
cards.flavor: "Wherever I walk, the ancestors walk too."

cards.name: Abzan Falconer
cards.text:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.
cards.flavor: The fastest way across the dunes is above.

cards.name: Ainok Bond-Kin
cards.text:
Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.
cards.flavor: "Hold the line, for family and the fallen!"

cards.name: Alabaster Kirin
cards.text: Flying, vigilance
cards.flavor: The appearance of a kirin signifies the passing or arrival of an important figure. As word of sightings spread, all the khans took it to mean themselves. Only the shaman Chianul thought of Sarkhan Vol.

cards.name: Brave the Sands
cards.text:
Creatures you control have vigilance.
Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.
cards.flavor: Enduring the most desolate and dangerous conditions, Abzan sentries unfailingly guard the stronghold gates.

cards.name: Dazzling Ramparts
cards.text:
Defender
{1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: When Anafenza holds court under the First Tree, the gates of Mer-Ek are sealed. No safer place exists in all of Tarkir.

cards.name: Defiant Strike
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Stand where the whole battle can see you. Strike so they'll never forget."
-Anafenza, khan of the Abzan

cards.name: End Hostilities
cards.text: Destroy all creatures and all permanents attached to creatures.
cards.flavor: Her palm flared like the eye of a waking dragon. Then all was calm.

cards.name: Erase
cards.text: Exile target enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"Truth is hard enough to see, let alone understand. We must remove all distractions to find clarity."
-Zogye, wandering sage

cards.name: Feat of Resistance
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)
cards.flavor: Dragons are extinct on Tarkir, but Abzan magic still emulates their endurance.

cards.name: Firehoof Cavalry
cards.text: {3}{R}: Firehoof Cavalry gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "What warrior worth the name fears to leave a trail? If my enemies seek me, let them follow the ashes in my wake."

cards.name: Herald of Anafenza
cards.text:
Outlast {2}{W} ({2}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Whenever you activate Herald of Anafenza's outlast ability, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.

cards.name: High Sentinels of Arashin
cards.text:
Flying
High Sentinels of Arashin gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{3}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Jeskai Student
cards.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: Discipline is the first pillar of the Jeskai Way. Each member of the clan trains in a weapon, perfecting its use over a lifetime.

cards.name: Kill Shot
cards.text: Destroy target attacking creature.
cards.flavor: Mardu archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They never miss their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

cards.name: Mardu Hateblade
cards.text: {B}: Mardu Hateblade gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: "There may be little honor in my tactics, but there is no honor in losing."

cards.name: Mardu Hordechief
cards.text: Raid - When Mardu Hordechief enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.
cards.flavor: The horde grows with each assault.

cards.name: Master of Pearls
cards.text:
Morph {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Master of Pearls is turned face up, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Rush of Battle
cards.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Warrior creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by those Warriors also causes their controller to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: The Mardu charge reflects the dragon's speed-and its hunger.

cards.name: Sage-Eye Harrier
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {3}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: These winged warriors meditate in flight, tracing mandalas in the clouds.

cards.name: Salt Road Patrol
cards.text: Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor:
"Soldiers win battles, but supplies win wars."
-Kadri, Abzan caravan master

foreignPrintings.name: Patrouille de la Route du sel

cards.name: Seeker of the Way
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Seeker of the Way gains lifelink until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "I don't know where my destiny lies, but I know it isn't here."

cards.name: Siegecraft
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+4.
cards.flavor:
"They thought their fortress impregnable . . . until we marched up with ours, and blocked out the sun."
-Golran, dragonscale captain

cards.name: Smite the Monstrous
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor:
"The dragons thought they were too strong to be tamed, too large to fall. And where are they now?"
-Khibat the Revered

cards.name: Suspension Field
cards.text: When Suspension Field enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature with toughness 3 or greater until Suspension Field leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

cards.name: Take Up Arms
cards.text: Create three 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.
cards.flavor:
"Many scales make the skin of a dragon."
-Abzan wisdom

cards.name: Timely Hordemate
cards.text: Raid - When Timely Hordemate enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Venerable Lammasu
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Lammasu are the enigmatic travelers of Tarkir, soaring high above all lands in all seasons. None know their true purpose, but they often arrive on the eve of great conflicts or turning points in history.

cards.name: War Behemoth
cards.text: Morph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"The Houses always hope for peace, but we always pack for war."
-Gvar Barzeel, krumar commander

cards.name: Watcher of the Roost
cards.text:
Flying
Morph-Reveal a white card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Watcher of the Roost is turned face up, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Wingmate Roc
cards.text:
Flying
Raid - When Wingmate Roc enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, create a 3/4 white Bird creature token with flying.
Whenever Wingmate Roc attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

cards.name: Blinding Spray
cards.text:
Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The stronger our enemies seem, the more vulnerable they are."
-Sultai secret

cards.name: Cancel
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor:
"Even the greatest inferno begins as a spark. And anyone can snuff out a spark."
-Chanyi, mistfire sage

cards.name: Clever Impersonator
cards.text: You may have Clever Impersonator enter the battlefield as a copy of any nonland permanent on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"Our own selves are the greatest obstacles to enlightenment."
-Narset, khan of the Jeskai

cards.name: Crippling Chill
cards.text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: In the silence of the ice, even dreams become still.

cards.name: Dig Through Time
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Disdainful Stroke
cards.text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

cards.name: Dragon's Eye Savants
cards.text:
Morph-Reveal a blue card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dragon's Eye Savants is turned face up, look at target opponent's hand.

cards.name: Embodiment of Spring
cards.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Embodiment of Spring: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: Arel dreamed of winter's end. The next morning she followed a strange trail and found a seedling in the snow.

cards.name: Force Away
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor: Where an enemy once rode, not even a whisper remains.

cards.name: Glacial Stalker
cards.text: Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"Have you spent a winter high in the mountains, where the ice walks and speaks to the wind? It is not a place for those who have not learned respect."
-Ulnok, Temur shaman

cards.name: Icy Blast
cards.text:
Tap X target creatures.
Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
cards.flavor: "Do not think the sand or the sun will hold back the breath of winter."

cards.name: Jeskai Elder
cards.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Jeskai Elder deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Jeskai Windscout
cards.text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: They range from Sage-Eye Stronghold to the farthest reaches of Tarkir.

cards.name: Kheru Spellsnatcher
cards.text:
Morph {4}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Kheru Spellsnatcher is turned face up, counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.

cards.name: Mistfire Weaver
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Mistfire Weaver is turned face up, target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn.

cards.name: Monastery Flock
cards.text:
Defender, flying
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"The arrow strikes one bird down, but the flock remains."
-Jeskai teaching

cards.name: Mystic of the Hidden Way
cards.text:
Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked.
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: "There are no obstacles, only different paths."

cards.name: Pearl Lake Ancient
cards.text:
Flash
This spell can't be countered.
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Return three lands you control to their owner's hand: Return Pearl Lake Ancient to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Quiet Contemplation
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, tap target creature an opponent controls and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Riverwheel Aerialists
cards.text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: Adepts of the Riverwheel Stronghold can run through rain and never get wet; masters use the raindrops as stepping stones.

cards.name: Scaldkin
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Scaldkin: It deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: The Temur believe that scaldkin are born when eruptions melt the frozen whispers of sleeping ancestors.

cards.name: Scion of Glaciers
cards.text: {U}: Scion of Glaciers gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"There is nothing so free as the spring river born of winter's ice."
-Nitula, the Hunt Caller

cards.name: Set Adrift
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor: The envoy spoke, and Sidisi replied.

cards.name: Singing Bell Strike
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Singing Bell Strike enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
Enchanted creature has "{6}: Untap this creature."

cards.name: Stubborn Denial
cards.text:
Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, counter that spell instead.
cards.flavor: The Temur have no patience for subtlety.

cards.name: Taigam's Scheming
cards.text: Surveil 5. (Look at the top five cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
cards.flavor: "The Jeskai would have me bow in restraint. So I have found a people unafraid of true power."

cards.name: Thousand Winds
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Thousand Winds is turned face up, return all other tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Treasure Cruise
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

cards.name: Waterwhirl
cards.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor:
"Be as water: untamed and unheld, yet inexorably flowing toward a greater goal."
-Shensu, Riverwheel mystic

cards.name: Weave Fate
cards.text: Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Temur shamans speak of three destinies: the now, the echo of the past, and the unwritten. They find flickering paths among tangled possibilities.

cards.name: Wetland Sambar
cards.flavor: As a test of calm and compassion, a Jeskai monk softly approaches a grazing sambar and offers it a lotus from his or her hand. If the creature eats, the student ascends to the next level of training.

cards.name: Whirlwind Adept
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

cards.name: Bellowing Saddlebrute
cards.text: Raid - When Bellowing Saddlebrute enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life unless you attacked this turn.

cards.name: Bitter Revelation
cards.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"Here you lie then, Ugin. The corpses of worlds will join you in the tomb."
-Sorin Markov

cards.name: Bloodsoaked Champion
cards.text:
Bloodsoaked Champion can't block.
Raid - {1}{B}: Return Bloodsoaked Champion from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if you attacked this turn.
cards.flavor: "Death is merely another foe the Mardu will overcome."

cards.name: Dead Drop
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Target player sacrifices two creatures.
cards.flavor:
Got a diving lesson
-Sultai expression meaning "was fed to the crocodiles"

cards.name: Debilitating Injury
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
cards.flavor:
"If weakness does not exist within the Temur then we shall force it upon them."
-Sidisi, khan of the Sultai

cards.name: Despise
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"You have returned from fire, traitor. This time I will see you leave as ashes."
-Zurgo, to Sarkhan Vol

cards.name: Disowned Ancestor
cards.text: Outlast {1}{B} ({1}{B}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor: Long after death, the spirits of the Disowned continue to seek redemption among their Abzan kin.

cards.name: Dutiful Return
cards.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"We have a word for enemies too mutilated for military service: furniture."
-Taigam, Sidisi's Hand

cards.name: Empty the Pits
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Create X tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
cards.flavor: The Sultai would rebuild the empire on the backs of the dead.

cards.name: Grim Haruspex
cards.text:
Morph {B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "We all want to know what's going on in someone else's head. I simply open it up and look."

cards.name: Gurmag Swiftwing
cards.text: Flying, first strike, haste
cards.flavor:
"Anything a falcon can do, a bat can do in pitch darkness."
-Urdnan the Wanderer

cards.name: Kheru Bloodsucker
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Kheru Bloodsucker.
cards.flavor: It stares through the empty, pain-twisted faces of those it has drained.

cards.name: Kheru Dreadmaw
cards.text:
Defender
{1}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
cards.flavor: Its hunting instincts have long since rotted away. Its hunger, however, remains.

cards.name: Krumar Bond-Kin
cards.text: Morph {4}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: "The Abzan replaced my savagery with a noble heritage. I would give my life for my House."

cards.name: Mardu Skullhunter
cards.text:
Mardu Skullhunter enters the battlefield tapped.
Raid - When Mardu Skullhunter enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Mer-Ek Nightblade
cards.text:
Outlast {B} ({B}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has deathtouch.

cards.name: Molting Snakeskin
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "{2}{B}: Regenerate this creature."
cards.flavor: Flesh wounds are meaningless to those who discard their flesh so readily.

cards.name: Murderous Cut
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Destroy target creature.
cards.flavor: The blades of a Sultai assassin stab like the fangs of a dragon.

cards.name: Necropolis Fiend
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Flying
{X}, {T}, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

cards.name: Raiders' Spoils
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+0.
Whenever a Warrior you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"To conquer is to eat."
-Edicts of Ilagra

cards.name: Rakshasa's Secret
cards.text: Target opponent discards two cards. Mill two cards.
cards.flavor: The voice of a rakshasa is soft, its breath sweet. But every word is the murmur of madness.

cards.name: Retribution of the Ancients
cards.text: {B}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Abzan ancestors died to protect their Houses, and they protect them still.

cards.name: Rite of the Serpent
cards.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature had a +1/+1 counter on it, create a 1/1 green Snake creature token.
cards.flavor:
"From your death, new life. From your loss, our profit."
-Kirada, Qarsi overseer

cards.name: Rotting Mastodon
cards.flavor: Mastodons became extinct long ago, but foul forces of the Gurmag Swamp sometimes animate their decaying remains. The Sultai happily exploit such creatures but consider them inferior to their own necromantic creations.

cards.name: Ruthless Ripper
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Morph-Reveal a black card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Ruthless Ripper is turned face up, target player loses 2 life.

cards.name: Shambling Attendants
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor:
"Let the world behold what becomes of those who defy us."
-Taigam, Sidisi's Hand

cards.name: Sidisi's Pet
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Morph {1}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: The Sultai distinguish between pet and slave by the material of the chain.

cards.name: Sultai Scavenger
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Flying
cards.flavor: Since they guard armies of walking carrion, Sultai aven are never far from a meal.

foreignPrintings.name: スゥルタイのゴミあさり

cards.name: Swarm of Bloodflies
cards.text:
Flying
Swarm of Bloodflies enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm of Bloodflies.
cards.flavor: In the Gudul delta, bloodfly bites are indistinguishable from spear wounds.

cards.name: Throttle
cards.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The best servants are made from those who died without a scratch."
-Sidisi, khan of the Sultai

cards.name: Unyielding Krumar
cards.text: {1}{W}: Unyielding Krumar gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "The man whom I call father killed the orc who sired me, offering his world and his blade in return."

cards.name: Act of Treason
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor:
"The Sultai take our dead, so we shall take their living!"
-Taklai, Mardu ragesinger

cards.name: Ainok Tracker
cards.text:
First strike
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Some ainok of the mountains are accepted among the Temur as trusted hunt-mates.

cards.name: Arc Lightning
cards.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
cards.flavor: Lightning burns its own path.

cards.name: Arrow Storm
cards.text:
Arrow Storm deals 4 damage to any target.
Raid - If you attacked this turn, instead Arrow Storm deals 5 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.
cards.flavor: First the thunder, then the rain.

cards.name: Ashcloud Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying
When Ashcloud Phoenix dies, return it to the battlefield face down under your control.
Morph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Ashcloud Phoenix is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to each player.

cards.name: Barrage of Boulders
cards.text:
Barrage of Boulders deals 1 damage to each creature you don't control.
Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, creatures can't block this turn.
cards.flavor: Crude tactics can be effective nonetheless.

cards.name: Bloodfire Expert
cards.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: Some efreet abandon their homes in the volcanic Fire Rim to embrace the Jeskai Way and discipline their innate flames.

cards.name: Bloodfire Mentor
cards.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: The adept underwent months of preparation to withstand pain, until he was finally ready to receive the efreet master's teachings.

cards.name: Bring Low
cards.text: Bring Low deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has a +1/+1 counter on it, Bring Low deals 5 damage to it instead.
cards.flavor:
"People are often humbled by the elements. But the elements, too, can be humbled."
-Surrak, khan of the Temur

cards.name: Burn Away
cards.text: Burn Away deals 6 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, exile its controller's graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Your corruption will burn, serpent, until there is nothing left to defile."
-Asmala, bloodfire mystic

cards.name: Canyon Lurkers
cards.text: Morph {3}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: The broken Qal Sisma foothills make poor terrain for cavalry, but a perfect setting for ambushes.

cards.name: Crater's Claws
cards.text:
Crater's Claws deals X damage to any target.
Ferocious - Crater's Claws deals X plus 2 damage instead if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.name: Dragon Grip
cards.text:
Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may cast Dragon Grip as though it had flash. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike.

cards.name: Dragon-Style Twins
cards.text:
Double strike
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: "We are the flicker of the flame and its heat, the two sides of a single blade."

cards.name: Goblinslide
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.
cards.flavor: Goblins, like snowflakes, are only dangerous in numbers.

cards.name: Horde Ambusher
cards.text:
Whenever Horde Ambusher blocks, it deals 1 damage to you.
Morph-Reveal a red card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Horde Ambusher is turned face up, target creature can't block this turn.

cards.name: Hordeling Outburst
cards.text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
cards.flavor:
"Leave no scraps, lest you attract pests."
-Mardu threat

cards.name: Howl of the Horde
cards.text:
When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Raid - If you attacked this turn, when you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell an additional time. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.name: Jeering Instigator
cards.text:
Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Jeering Instigator is turned face up, if it's your turn, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Leaping Master
cards.text: {2}{W}: Leaping Master gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Strength batters down barriers. Discipline ignores them."

cards.name: Mardu Blazebringer
cards.text: When Mardu Blazebringer attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
cards.flavor:
"Make sure he's pointed in the right direction before you light him. And don't let the goblins anywhere near the torch."
-Kerai Suddenblade, Mardu hordechief

cards.name: Mardu Heart-Piercer
cards.text: Raid - When Mardu Heart-Piercer enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, Mardu Heart-Piercer deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: "Those who have never ridden before the wind do not know the true joy of war."

cards.name: Mardu Warshrieker
cards.text: Raid - When Mardu Warshrieker enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, add {R}{W}{B}.
cards.flavor:
"No body can contain so much fury. It reminds me of another battle, long past."
-Sarkhan Vol

cards.name: Monastery Swiftspear
cards.text:
Haste
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

cards.name: Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker
cards.text:
[+1]: Until end of turn, Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker becomes a legendary 4/4 red Dragon creature with flying, indestructible, and haste. (He doesn't lose loyalty while he's not a planeswalker.)
[−3]: Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker deals 4 damage to target creature.
[−6]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards" and "At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand."

cards.name: Shatter
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor: The ogre's mind snapped. The bow was next. The archer followed quickly after.

cards.name: Summit Prowler
cards.flavor:
"Do you hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? They are as fierce as the bear that fears no foe and as sly as the mink that creeps unseen. You will be as much prey as they."
-Nitula, the Hunt Caller

cards.name: Swift Kick
cards.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.
cards.flavor: Shintan sensed the malice in his opponent, but he did not strike until the orc's muscles tensed in preparation to throw the first punch.

cards.name: Tormenting Voice
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor:
"Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"
-Sarkhan Vol

cards.name: Trumpet Blast
cards.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Do you hear that, Sarkhan? The glory of the horde! I made a legend from what you abandoned."
-Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

cards.name: Valley Dasher
cards.text:
Haste
Valley Dasher attacks each combat if able.
cards.flavor: Mardu riders' greatest fear is that a battle might end before their weapons draw blood.

cards.name: War-Name Aspirant
cards.text:
Raid - War-Name Aspirant enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
War-Name Aspirant can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.
cards.flavor: No battle means more to a Mardu warrior than the one that earns her war name.

cards.name: Alpine Grizzly
cards.flavor: The Temur welcome bears into the clan, fighting alongside them in battle. The relationship dates back to when they labored side by side under Sultai rule.

cards.name: Archers' Parapet
cards.text:
Defender
{1}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life.
cards.flavor: Every shaft is graven with a name from a kin tree, calling upon the spirits of the ancestors to make it fly true.

cards.name: Awaken the Bear
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: When Temur warriors enter the battle trance known as "awakening the bear," they lose all sense of enemy or friend, seeing only threats to the wilderness.

cards.name: Become Immense
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

cards.name: Dragonscale Boon
cards.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature and untap it.
cards.flavor:
"When we were lost and weary, the ainok showed us how to survive. They have earned the right to call themselves Abzan, and to wear the Scale."
-Anafenza, khan of the Abzan

cards.name: Feed the Clan
cards.text:
You gain 5 life.
Ferocious - You gain 10 life instead if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: The Temur believe three things only are needed in life: a hot fire, a full belly, and a strong companion.

cards.name: Hardened Scales
cards.text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
cards.flavor:
"Naga shed their scales. We wear ours with pride."
-Golran, dragonscale captain

cards.name: Heir of the Wilds
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Ferocious - Whenever Heir of the Wilds attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Heir of the Wilds gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In the high caves of the Qal Sisma mountains, young hunters quest to hear the echoes of their fierce ancestors.

cards.name: Highland Game
cards.text: When Highland Game dies, you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"Bring down a stag and fix its horns upon her head. This one hears the whispers."
-Chianul, at the weaving of Arel

cards.name: Hooded Hydra
cards.text:
Hooded Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When Hooded Hydra dies, create a 1/1 green Snake creature token for each +1/+1 counter on it.
Morph {3}{G}{G}
As Hooded Hydra is turned face up, put five +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: Hooting Mandrills
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Trample
cards.flavor: Interlopers in Sultai territory usually end up as crocodile chow or baboon bait.

foreignPrintings.name: わめき騒ぐマンドリル

cards.name: Incremental Growth
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.
cards.flavor: The bonds of family cross the boundaries of race.

cards.name: Kin-Tree Warden
cards.text:
{2}: Regenerate Kin-Tree Warden.
Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: "The amber of the tree and the blood of my veins are the same."

cards.name: Longshot Squad
cards.text:
Outlast {1}{G} ({1}{G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has reach. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

foreignPrintings.name: Escouade de tir à longue distance

cards.name: Meandering Towershell
cards.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Whenever Meandering Towershell attacks, exile it. Return it to the battlefield under your control tapped and attacking at the beginning of the declare attackers step on your next turn.

cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: The remains of ancient sky tyrants now feed the war-torn land.

cards.name: Pine Walker
cards.text:
Morph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
Whenever Pine Walker or another creature you control is turned face up, untap that creature.

cards.name: Rattleclaw Mystic
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R}.
Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Rattleclaw Mystic is turned face up, add {G}{U}{R}.

cards.name: Roar of Challenge
cards.text:
All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
Ferocious - That creature gains indestructible until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.name: Sagu Archer
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Morph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: His arrows whistle like a serpent's hiss.

cards.name: Savage Punch
cards.text:
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.
Ferocious - The creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn before it fights if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.name: Scout the Borders
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"I am in my element: the element of surprise."
-Mogai, Sultai scout

cards.name: See the Unwritten
cards.text:
Reveal the top eight cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Ferocious - If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may put two creature cards onto the battlefield instead of one.

foreignPrintings.name: Voir ce qui n'est pas écrit
Vedere Ciò che Non è Scritto
書かれざるものの視認

cards.name: Seek the Horizon
cards.text: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: The Temur call the flickering lights the Path of Whispers, believing that they lead the way to ancestral knowledge.

cards.name: Smoke Teller
cards.text: {1}{U}: Look at target face-down creature.
cards.flavor: "See your enemies from a thousand sides. Then you will find a thousand ways to kill them."

cards.name: Sultai Flayer
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.
cards.flavor: "You can have the body, necromancer. I just want the skin."

foreignPrintings.name: スゥルタイの剥ぎ取り

cards.name: Temur Charger
cards.text:
Morph-Reveal a green card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Temur Charger is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Trail of Mystery
cards.text:
Whenever a face-down creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Tusked Colossodon
cards.flavor: A band of Temur hunters, fleeing the Mardu, dug a hideout beneath such a creature as it slept. The horde found them and attacked. For three days the Temur held them at bay, and all the while the great beast slumbered.

cards.name: Tuskguard Captain
cards.text:
Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
cards.flavor: One quiet word sets off the stampede.

cards.name: Windstorm
cards.text: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"When the last dragon fell, its spirit escaped as a roar into the wind."
-Temur tale

cards.name: Woolly Loxodon
cards.text: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

cards.name: Abomination of Gudul
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Abomination of Gudul deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Morph {2}{B}{G}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Abzan Ascendancy
cards.text:
When Abzan Ascendancy enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Abzan Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Exile target creature with power 3 or greater.
• You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
• Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

cards.name: Abzan Guide
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Morph {2}{W}{B}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: "These roads are desolate and changeable. Follow me, or die in the wastes."

cards.name: Anafenza, the Foremost
cards.text:
Whenever Anafenza, the Foremost attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on another target tapped creature you control.
If a nontoken creature an opponent owns would die or a creature card not on the battlefield would be put into an opponent's graveyard, exile that card instead.
cards.flavor: Rarely at rest on the Amber Throne, Anafenza always leads the Abzan Houses to battle.

foreignPrintings.name: 先頭に立つもの、アナフェンザ

cards.name: Ankle Shanker
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Ankle Shanker attacks, creatures you control gain first strike and deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The stature of the fighter matters less than the depth of the cut.

cards.name: Armament Corps
cards.text: When Armament Corps enters the battlefield, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures you control.
cards.flavor: The Abzan avoid extended supply lines by incorporating weapons stores into their battle formations.

cards.name: Avalanche Tusker
cards.text: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.
cards.flavor:
"Hold the high ground, then bring it to your enemy."
-Surrak, khan of the Temur

cards.name: Bear's Companion
cards.text: When Bear's Companion enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Bear creature token.
cards.flavor: "The Sultai came hunting for a bear hide. Now I have a belt of naga skin, and my friend has a full belly."

cards.name: Butcher of the Horde
cards.text:
Flying
Sacrifice another creature: Butcher of the Horde gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Chief of the Edge
cards.text: Other Warrior creatures you control get +1/+0.
cards.flavor: "We are the swift, the strong, the blade's sharp shriek! Fear nothing, and strike!"

cards.name: Chief of the Scale
cards.text: Other Warrior creatures you control get +0/+1.
cards.flavor: "We are the shield unbroken. If we fall today, we will die well, and our trees will bear our names in honor."

cards.name: Crackling Doom
cards.text: Crackling Doom deals 2 damage to each opponent. Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.
cards.flavor: Do not fear the lightning. Fear the one it obeys.

cards.name: Death Frenzy
cards.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: The crocodiles' putrid jaws swallow everything but the screams.

cards.name: Deflecting Palm
cards.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. If damage is prevented this way, Deflecting Palm deals that much damage to that source's controller.

cards.name: Duneblast
cards.text: Choose up to one creature. Destroy the rest.
cards.flavor: The Abzan turn to this spell only as a last resort, for its inevitable result is what they most dread: to be alone.

cards.name: Efreet Weaponmaster
cards.text:
First strike
When Efreet Weaponmaster enters the battlefield or is turned face up, another target creature you control gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {2}{U}{R}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

foreignPrintings.name: イフリートの武器熟練者

cards.name: Flying Crane Technique
cards.text: Untap all creatures you control. They gain flying and double strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: There are many Jeskai styles: Riverwalk imitates flowing water, Dragonfist the ancient hellkites, and Flying Crane the wild aven of the high peaks.

foreignPrintings.name: Technique de l'envol de la grue

cards.name: Highspire Mantis
cards.text: Flying, trample
cards.flavor: Its wings produce a high-pitched, barely audible whirring sound in flight. Only Jeskai masters are quiet enough to hear one coming.

cards.name: Icefeather Aven
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {1}{G}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Icefeather Aven is turned face up, you may return another target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Ivorytusk Fortress
cards.text: Untap each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it during each other player's untap step.
cards.flavor: Abzan soldiers march to war confident that their Houses march with them.

cards.name: Jeskai Ascendancy
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Jeskai Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
• Jeskai Charm deals 4 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

cards.name: Kheru Lich Lord
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return a creature card at random from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains flying, trample, and haste. Exile that card at the beginning of your next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

cards.name: Kin-Tree Invocation
cards.text: Create an X/X black and green Spirit Warrior creature token, where X is the greatest toughness among creatures you control.
cards.flavor: The passing years add new rings to the tree's trunk, bolstering the spirits that dwell within.

cards.name: Mantis Rider
cards.text: Flying, vigilance, haste
cards.flavor: Mantis riders know their mounts owe them no allegiance. Even a mantis ridden for years would consume a rider who loses focus for only a moment.

cards.name: Mardu Ascendancy
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control attacks, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking.
Sacrifice Mardu Ascendancy: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Mardu Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Mardu Charm deals 4 damage to target creature.
• Create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens. They gain first strike until end of turn.
• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Mardu Roughrider
cards.text: Whenever Mardu Roughrider attacks, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor: The most ferocious saddlebrutes lead the assault, ramming through massed pikes and stout barricades as if they were paper and silk.

foreignPrintings.name: マルドゥの荒くれ乗り

cards.name: Master the Way
cards.text: Draw a card. Master the Way deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards in your hand.
cards.flavor:
"The Way has no beginning and no end. It is simply the path."
-Narset, khan of the Jeskai

cards.name: Mindswipe
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Mindswipe deals X damage to that spell's controller.
cards.flavor:
"The past and the unwritten are frozen. To understand their meaning requires heat."
-Arel the Whisperer

cards.name: Narset, Enlightened Master
cards.text:
First strike, hexproof
Whenever Narset, Enlightened Master attacks, exile the top four cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast noncreature spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.

foreignPrintings.name: 悟った達人、ナーセット

cards.name: Ponyback Brigade
cards.text:
When Ponyback Brigade enters the battlefield or is turned face up, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Morph {2}{R}{W}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Rakshasa Deathdealer
cards.text:
{B}{G}: Rakshasa Deathdealer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
{B}{G}: Regenerate Rakshasa Deathdealer.
cards.flavor: "Death fills me and makes me strong. You, it will reduce to nothing."

foreignPrintings.name: ラクシャーサの死与え

cards.name: Rakshasa Vizier
cards.text: Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from your graveyard, put that many +1/+1 counters on Rakshasa Vizier.
cards.flavor: Rakshasa offer deals that sound advantageous to those who forget who they are dealing with.

cards.name: Ride Down
cards.text: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I will wash you from my hooves!"
-Mardu taunt

cards.name: Sage of the Inward Eye
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "No one petal claims beauty for the lotus."

cards.name: Sagu Mauler
cards.text:
Trample, hexproof
Morph {3}{G}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: The Sagu Jungle's thick undergrowth conceals even the largest predators-if they wish to remain hidden.

cards.name: Savage Knuckleblade
cards.text:
{2}{G}: Savage Knuckleblade gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
{2}{U}: Return Savage Knuckleblade to its owner's hand.
{R}: Savage Knuckleblade gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Secret Plans
cards.text:
Face-down creatures you control get +0/+1.
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Rakshasa trade in secrets, amassing wealth from their careful revelation.

cards.name: Sidisi, Brood Tyrant
cards.text:
Whenever Sidisi, Brood Tyrant enters the battlefield or attacks, mill three cards.
Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from your library, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Siege Rhino
cards.text:
Trample
When Siege Rhino enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: The mere approach of an Abzan war beast is enough to send enemies fleeing in panic.

cards.name: Snowhorn Rider
cards.text:
Trample
Morph {2}{G}{U}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Sure-footed, strong-willed, and ill-tempered-and so is the ram.

cards.name: Sorin, Solemn Visitor
cards.text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain lifelink.
[−2]: Create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying.
[−6]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature."

foreignPrintings.name: 真面目な訪問者、ソリン

cards.name: Sultai Ascendancy
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

cards.name: Sultai Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy target monocolored creature.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Draw two cards, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: "Strike," the fumes hiss. "Raise an empire with your ambition."

cards.name: Sultai Soothsayer
cards.text: When Sultai Soothsayer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: The naga of the Sultai Brood made deals with dark forces to keep their power.

cards.name: Surrak Dragonclaw
cards.text:
Flash
This spell can't be countered.
Creature spells you control can't be countered.
Other creatures you control have trample.
cards.flavor: Both his rank and his scars were earned in single combat against a cave bear.

cards.name: Temur Ascendancy
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Temur Charm
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Creatures with power 3 or less can't block this turn.

cards.name: Trap Essence
cards.text: Counter target creature spell. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Meat sustains the body. The spirit requires different sustenance."
-Arel the Whisperer

cards.name: Utter End
cards.text: Exile target nonland permanent.
cards.flavor:
"I came seeking a challenge. All I found was you."
-Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

cards.name: Villainous Wealth
cards.text: Target opponent exiles the top X cards of their library. You may cast any number of spells with mana value X or less from among them without paying their mana costs.
cards.flavor: Gold buys death. Death earns gold.

cards.name: Warden of the Eye
cards.text: When Warden of the Eye enters the battlefield, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: The wardens guard the sacred documents of Tarkir's history, though they are forbidden to read the words.

cards.name: Winterflame
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Tap target creature.
• Winterflame deals 2 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor:
"The mountains scream with the dragons' throats."
-Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

cards.name: Zurgo Helmsmasher
cards.text:
Haste
Zurgo Helmsmasher attacks each combat if able.
Zurgo Helmsmasher has indestructible as long as it's your turn.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Zurgo Helmsmasher this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Zurgo Helmsmasher.

cards.name: Abzan Banner
cards.text:
{T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G}.

cards.flavor: Stone to endure, roots to remember.

cards.name: Altar of the Brood
cards.text: Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills a card.
cards.flavor: Supplicants offer flesh and silver, flowers and blood. The altar takes what it will, eyes gleaming with unspoken promises.

cards.name: Briber's Purse

Briber's Purse enters the battlefield with X gem counters on it.
{1}, {T}, Remove a gem counter from Briber's Purse: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
cards.flavor: Victory is certain. The price, negotiable.

cards.name: Cranial Archive
cards.text: {2}, Exile Cranial Archive: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The greatest idea the zombie ever had in its head wasn't even its own.

cards.name: Dragon Throne of Tarkir
cards.text:
Equipped creature has defender and "{2}, {T}: Other creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature's power."
Equip {3}
cards.flavor: What once soared high above Tarkir is now reduced to a seat.

Ghostfire Blade's equip ability costs {2} less to activate if it targets a colorless creature.
cards.flavor: If you fear the dragon's fire, you are unworthy to wield it.

cards.name: Heart-Piercer Bow
cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, Heart-Piercer Bow deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor: Designed by an ancient artificer, the finest Mardu bows are carved from dragon bone and strung with the wind itself.
